website_summaries.verdict: The Magellan Wireless Back-Up Camera boosts the functionality of the RoadMate 9055-LM and upgrades the safety and convenience of any vehicle with very little effort.
pros: After a simple, 30-minute installation, the Magellan Wireless Back-Up Camera seamlessly and automatically delivers video of the area behind the vehicle to a Magellan portable navigation device
The waterproof camera features an ultrawide field of view and good low-light sensitivity
cons: The camera system can't operate as a standalone unit, requiring an expensive PND to function
Spade connectors supplied for installation are slightly too large for the wires they're expected to join

customer_reviews.title: customer support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item & finally tried to get it installed, after 3 hours & costly labor charges item was defective, after 45 minutes on hold with Magellan, they said I know had to supply proof of purchase & they will replace, but not credit me the $100 in labor cost the technician spent on the phone with Magellan which consisted of a 30 minute wait & a 45 minute support to find out the unit was defective. This company is virtually impossible to get thru to Tech support. Would never purchase another product from them
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Quality is mediocre... from a name brand
customer_reviews.text: Looking at Magellan website, and their marketing material. You would think this product is awesome. While it works, it is just ok... don't expect something on par with Car backup cameras from dealer. You will at best get 1-2 frames per second (1-2 fps). Meaning that someone can get into frame, and the update wont be fast enough. Real concern when you backup your car. My nissan Leaf backup camera gets about 10 fps
customer_reviews.author: David Hwu

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Received it in the mail today and it was in and working 4 hrs. later. Biggest time consumer was finding wires to connect to and running one thru the body. NOW , if it don't stop in a week or so I'm good with it. Will try to update in week or so. Thanks for all the advise from you guys.
customer_reviews.author: close2right

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my Prius...
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that mounts on the license plate blocks access to the electrical switch that pops the latch! I had to cut the thing and fabricate a mount which was located to the left [where the add-on factory backup camera goes]. I had great difficulty getting the electrical connectors to make contact w/ the backup light wiring. I finally threw them away and soldered the wires. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Back up cameera
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that mounting this camera on my left side licence plate would make the camera not work well. I had it installed by my regular mechanic. Love this product. Wide angle is amazing. This is installed on a 23' motor home.If you see a motor home on the road, that little window in the center of the vehicle is my bathroom window and No I can not see out of it from the drivers seat.
customer_reviews.author: SuseBee2

customer_reviews.title: Wireless back up camera
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this for me for Xmas along with the 1700LM. It took a while to get the camera to work..only 2.5 hours(which is the reason for 3 stars). I had the same issue with the switching back and forth between camera, menu and GPS screen. Once I found the happy spot for the transmitter it worked. It takes about 6-8 seconds for my camera to come on. The camera refreshes slowly so you have to back up slow. If I have any issues I'll be sure to update.
customer_reviews.author: Troy M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: customer service is a disastor
customer_reviews.text: I bought a backup camera and a GPS. Both were defective from the box and its been over a month and after I paid to return them I still don't have my replacements. Also even though I reported it within 30 days of purchase they are trying to replace it with refurbished units.
customer_reviews.author: bchbumwnabe

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but slow
customer_reviews.text: The guys at Best Buy had trouble getting the camera to come on line for quite a while, but finally it connected to my Magellan GPS. It's on the back of my pickup and I use it to line the trailer hitch up. The biggest problem is that it's refresh rate is really slow. It's fine for just checking behind the vehicle, but when in motion, you can be two feet further in the time it takes the screen to refresh. I have to ease off the brake and then engage again immediately to check alignment before repeating.
customer_reviews.author: FirstExit

customer_reviews.title: A wast
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it is the back up camera or the Magellan GPS that is too blame. It only works about 25% of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Lon Boysen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste money on this. Worked for a VERY short time. Just made it past warranty. I will never purchase another Magellan product. No customer service to speak of.
customer_reviews.author: pofinmt

customer_reviews.title: Great little backup camera.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great with my Magellan GPS. Very clear, good visibility at night and even in bad weather. If you need a backup camera this is a very good option.
customer_reviews.author: Skulldigger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent view
customer_reviews.text: This back up camera gives an excellent wide angle view and is focused near and far. It does an excellent job plugged into the 7 inch Magellan GPS. I have a great fear of backing over a child and this fixes the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Snipes

customer_reviews.title: Image is ok with night time image very poor. For the cost pretty poor
customer_reviews.text: I hardwired this camera to GPS. Image is ok with night time image very poor. For the cost pretty poor. I have seen 20 camera, with distance lines and IR better.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product was installed by best buy...from the start would focus, faze out, go back to another menu. I had system cked twice with tech to no avail. Its useless at night. I will be replacing this product.
customer_reviews.author: wayne d. felty

customer_reviews.title: Handy - when it works
customer_reviews.text: SOmetimes works sometimes not. Wiring kit should be more complete
customer_reviews.author: B. Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera but it does not perform well after dark.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in good lighting situations. Disappointed with after dark performance on my 2006 Honda Ridgeline. Camera and does not perform well in low light nor after dark.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great part and great seller !!!!!!high quality!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great part and great seller high quality would highly recommend does and outstanding job. Quality of video is great sure has saved my back bumper.... Have installed on all my trucks
customer_reviews.author: Riz

customer_reviews.title: Back up camera defective after 3 months use
customer_reviews.text: When I installed this device it worked fine for about three months then just stopped working. The screen is black when car is in reverse. Magellan has poor customer service and I've yet to receive a replacement. It seems without the original purchase receipt they will not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Mone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have two vehicles and fortunately the back-up light wiring and liscense plate mounting location are easily reached by the included wiring. Our neghbor has a vehicle which has the liscense plate mounting location on the back door of their vehicle and the back-up lights are on the rear corner of the car. Connecting the wiring to the transmitter and camera is a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: jwiseman

customer_reviews.title: think twice
customer_reviews.text: Thought by buying a maggellan product that it was a good choice.Was installed for two weeks and during that time ,sometimes it would not work when in reverse.Then it would not work at all,fuzzy picture like someone put tape over lense. After speaking to customer support and updating software on the 1700, they decided that the camera had an issue. As of this date I am waiting for my replacement. Hope this solves the problem....
customer_reviews.author: stevem

customer_reviews.title: backup camera
customer_reviews.text: the resolution of this camera isn't what i expected and its low level light sensativity isn't much. other than that shortcoming its ok in the daytime. recomment you only use it with a larger format display, ie 7" or larger screen
customer_reviews.author: putcopaul

customer_reviews.title: Camera failed to operate as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Camera did NOT transmit up to 45 feet as advertised. It cut in and out of video when camera/transmitter got 6 feet or greater away from the monitor. I was totally disappointed. I purchased a new GPS to work with this camera and had to return both for hopefully a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Harpenau

customer_reviews.title: Works well on a 30ft box truck
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install if you can get to your back up wire easily. The receiver fits on the back of the gps mount easily. One slight drawback is if the gps is bounced much the receiver may come off the back of the gps. This puts a strain on the usb connector.
customer_reviews.author: RCP

customer_reviews.title: 1990 technoly selling in 2013?
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife, she wanted back up camera for her R350. I had garmin 3590LM, and i loved it. i was trying to look for the Garmin gps with backup camera, which garmin didn't make., so i've decides to buy Megellan's latest technolgy Roadmate 9250T-LMB with wireless back up camera. Oh my god, its BACK TO THE FUTURE, 1990's technoly selling in 2013. compare to my 9 month old Garmin 3590LM, which i bought it from amazon. its decades behind in technolgy(in all areas, display, color, fuction, easy of use.....). After trying the camera test, at night (u cant see nothing at night) do not have IR lights, my first Megellan experience will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: rog7254

customer_reviews.title: wireless camera works great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This wireless camera works great when paired with a Magellan 9055-LM and was easy to install. The camera works nice day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gentzke

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: More instruction on installation would be helpfull. If you are not adapt at wiring you may struggle a little with the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert L Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great. It was easy to hook up (15 mins) . It has a really good view even at night. I would recemend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, it really works , I wish I would of got it earlier .
customer_reviews.author: rudy

customer_reviews.title: Cutting and hole punching required
customer_reviews.text: you have to cut out---that is ok but how do you cut the holes. It is dificult to cut small holes. best to buy one that fit correctly
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Newbern

customer_reviews.title: Problems with tranmitter
customer_reviews.text: After having this camera installed, the Roadmate 9055 GPS (7") flashes between the backup camera picture and the main menu. Their support group didn't have any idea what the problem might be. I'm still working with them so I don't know how good their support is, but so far not so good. If I could do it all over again I would not have bought this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: ... adapt too my Magellan plug was too big not happy: (
customer_reviews.text: Did not adapt too my Magellan plug was too big not happy :( !!!
customer_reviews.author: michael watts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps getting water in it!Worswt customer service in history.....
customer_reviews.text: First of all,this cameras wireless function has alot of static.I ended up having to hard wire it to my roadmate 1700 that i bought with this camera,which is also a pile of crap.I will NEVER by magellan anything ever again!Its more than 6 months old so they are not going to warranty it!...$120 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Got it installed on my MDX
customer_reviews.text: This is great product if you don't want to open the complete wiring on the car, easily connect to the reverse light in 1 hour and send the camera data wirelessly. Got it done within $300 including the Magellan GPS
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Got the back camera today and installed it in about an hour. Others commented that "the manual was useless". Seemed pretty straightforward to me. Requires some basic mechanical skills and half a brain. Fired it up, worked perfectly and gives a much better picture than the last back up camera I installed. Works very well with the Magellan 1700 Roadmate. It takes about 4 seconds for it to transmit from the camera to the receiver once you shift into reverse, which is perfectly acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Rakirk

customer_reviews.title: Bought this (and a Magellan Roadmate GPS) for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this (and a Magellan Roadmate GPS) for my husband for an early Christmas gift to use with our 5th wheel camper. It doesn't work and I can't return it because I purchased before November 1! Now I'm stuck with over $500 worth of electronics that I can do nothing with! Should have stayed with Garmin for GPS and steered clear of Magellan. Very unhappy with this purchase and Amazon at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my new truck. I had gotten use to the one on my previous F150. This camera mounts lower )on the top of the license plate) than the Ford one (In the tailgate handle surround) so has a different perspective. It is also not as light sensitive as the Ford camera. Backing under the trailer in shadow was difficult until I painted the trailer tongue bright white. Still beats getting in and out of the truck top hook up or having my wife frantically waving her harms trying to guide me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  It's BRIGHT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easy it was to install this. And it is much brighter than the factory back-up camera on my wife's minivan. Because of the wireless transceiver it does have kind of a slow update rate (similar to the old 16fpm home movies my Grandpa made of the family in the 50s when my Dad was a kid), but if you back up at a reasonable speed it is not an issue. It also has a VERY wide field of view; sometimes I almost expect to see the sides of my own car with it!
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Walleman

customer_reviews.title: image is grainy and screen update is slow
customer_reviews.text: The installation is simple enough. The issue I have with the unit is that the picture is very low resolution and the frame rate is like looking through a strobe light. The 40 foot range must be line of sight, because my picture will drop in and out. I checked my wire for good connection and all was fine. I may have to relocate the unit or return it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this camera upon arrival it was way out ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this camera upon arrival it was way out of date and would not work with my Magellan 9270 GPS. I would've send it back to Amazon but Magellan sent a replacement, I felt tricked.
customer_reviews.author: Bonsy

customer_reviews.title: Operates very good. Slow to come on
customer_reviews.text: Video has some hash appearance but not all the time. Operates very good. Slow to come on, but not a big complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Leonjr

customer_reviews.title: A bit too complicated, I feel the "wireless" part ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit too complicated, I feel the "wireless" part is not true, it's quite messy when all done up. Especially on a small car.... I not sure I would actually use it....
customer_reviews.author: HD monkey

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble starting the Unit when the A/V wire is attached. I have to wait for the GPS to be up and running and then plug the camera in. The reverse is the case when I shut done. Annoying, took some trial and error to work the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfe M Schoenne

customer_reviews.title: easy to install works very good
customer_reviews.text: easy to install works very good. I wish it had infrared and back up lines to further line up my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Shutters

customer_reviews.title: works great with 9250T-LMB GPS
customer_reviews.text: Installed on RV. works great with 9250T-LMB GPS. wide angle, good picture
customer_reviews.author: windowman

customer_reviews.title: Bought with the Magellan Roadmate 1700
customer_reviews.text: This works flawlessly with the Roadmate switching to camera when you shift into reverse. We are extremely happy with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B.

customer_reviews.title: but if it is anything like the gps
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed it yet, but if it is anything like the gps, will give it 5 stars also
customer_reviews.author: sspudich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with magellan 7 inch GPS, cost a little more but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Leo McLain

customer_reviews.title: Not as great I thought it should be
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, I was expecting better. The video quality is grainy, when it's connected the GPS won't boot up! My much cheaper Canadian Tire camera works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: the cam is very easy to install, plus it works amazing. i would recommend this to any one needing an upscale cam..
customer_reviews.author: gus

customer_reviews.title: Junk! complete junk. installed it on a 2004 ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk ! complete junk. installed it on a 2004 Avalanche and would connect and then disconnect randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with the Magellan RoadMate 9400-LM 7-Inch GPS Navigator
customer_reviews.author: Christian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: does not work most of the time Magellan stop responding after first email
customer_reviews.author: R  and J

product_meta.title: Magellan CPBCKUSGXXX Wireless Back Up Camera
product_meta.description:
Package Type:Standard PackagingThe Magellan Wireless Back-up Camera transforms your Magellan Safety Services GPS in to a rearview monitor. Whether to keep your children safe or to fit your car into that tight parking space, the back-up camera gives you a window on the world behind your car. It's the perfect companion for your Magellan Safety Series1or RoadMate Pro 9165T GPS navigator - while your navigator guides you when driving, the back-up camera provides a measure of safety as you begin and end your trip. When you put your car in reverse, your Magellan navigator will switch from navigation mode to rear view mode, allowing you to see what is behind your car - including children, pets and toys.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Whether to keep your children safe or to fit your car into that tight parking space, the Magellan Wireless Back-up Camera gives you a window to the world behind your car.
It’s the perfect companion for select Magellan RoadMate GPS navigators! While your device guides you to and from your destination, the Wireless Back-up Camera provides a measure of safety before you've even hit the road!

When you put your car in reverse, your Magellan navigator will switch from navigation mode to rear view mode, allowing you to see what is behind your car - including children, pets and toys. When you arrive at your destination, the Magellan Wireless Back-up Camera will help you reverse and parallel park while giving you a much better sense of how close you are to objects behind your car - your best defense against damage to your vehicle.

Magellan is committed to providing safety and security on the road. The Magellan Wireless Back-up Camera extends that commitment to both the beginning and the end of your trip.

Professional Installation recommended.

Compatible Magellan RoadMate models include:
RM 5255T-LM
RM 5265T-LMB
RM 9250T-LMB
RM 9055
RM 9055-LM
RM 1700
RM 1700-MU
RM 1700-LM

Magellan RoadMate GPS navigators are not included with the purchase of a Wireless Back-up Camera and must be purchased separately.

NEW NAVIGATOR SOFTWARE UPDATE NOW AVAILABLE ON MAGELLAN CONTENT MANAGER FOR ROADMATE 9055 SERIES AND ROADMATE 1700 SERIES 
 Prior to using your new Wireless Back-up Camera, with the RM9055 series or the RM1700 series, be sure to update the software on your Magellan RoadMate GPS navigator to version 4.82 (or later). By doing so you also take advantage of these great features:

Improved Routing Performance
Improved Highway Lane Assist display
Audio/Video input enhancements for optional Magellan Wireless Back-up Camera companion
Compatibility for future Map Updates
Easily update through Magellan Content Manager – you no longer have to search for and select updates to download. Content Manager will automatically do it for you.

Go to www.magellangps.com to update your Magellan navigator software.

FEATURES
WIRELESS CAMERA MOUNTS ON YOUR LICENSE PLATE. 
No need to route wires throughout your car.

SUBSTANTIAL 45 FOOT RANGE
Great for most cars and small trailers.

CAMERA IS USER-ADJUSTABLE TO 45 DEGREES
Great for mounting in trucks and SUVs.

WIDE ANGLE VIEW LENS WITH SUBSTANTIAL 120 DEGREE HORIZONTAL AND 100 DEGREE VERTICAL VIEWING AREA
See people and objects coming into view behind your vehicle.

Automatically switches from navigation mode to back-up mode

When you put your car into reverse, your Magellan GPS navigator switches from navigation mode to rear view mode, allowing you to see behind your car.

DUST AND WATERPROOF CAMERA
Rated by international standard as IP67, your camera is highly protected in wet conditions and against dust which might impact performance.

TRANSMITTER IS WEATHERPROOF
With an IPX4 rating, the transmitter is water resistant.

MAY BE USED WITH VIDEO SYSTEMS WITH COMPATIBLE 3.5MM A/V INPUT
MIRROR OUTPUT FROM CAMERA
Whatever the driver sees on the right side of the mirror is what is on the right side of their car.

INSTALLATION
Professional installation recommended.
feature_bullets: Wireless camera mounts on your license plate
Wide Angle view lens with120° horizontal and 100°vertical viewing area
Camera is user-adjustable downward to 45 degrees
Automatically switches from navigation mode to backup mode

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars96 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
